evidence.text: 75 | 2024-07-31 | Joint MOTION to Dismiss by UNITED STATES OF AMERICA. (Attachments: # 1 Proposed Order)(Wuerker, Clare) (Entered: 07/31/2024)

extracted.value: United States filed a Joint Motion to Dismiss the case on July 31, 2024, leading to the court dismissing the action with prejudice.

evidence.text: 2 | 2020-08-05 | Joint MOTION for Entry of Consent Decree by UNITED STATES OF AMERICA. (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit, # 2 Proposed Order)(Wuerker, Clare) (Entered: 08/05/2020)

extracted.value: United States filed a Joint Motion for Entry of Consent Decree on August 5, 2020, seeking court approval of a settlement agreement incorporating terms to resolve the case.

evidence.text: 6 | 2020-09-09 | Joint MOTION to Appoint a Monitor by UNITED STATES OF AMERICA. (Attachments: # 1 Proposed Order)(Wuerker, Clare) (Entered: 09/09/2020)

extracted.value: United States filed a Joint Motion to Appoint a Monitor on September 9, 2020, requesting the court appoint a monitor to oversee compliance with the Consent Decree.

evidence.text: 50 | 2023-07-07 | MOTION to Terminate Sections 32-38 of the Agreement to Resolve the Department of Justice's Investigation of Hampton Roads Regional Jail by Hampton Roads Regional Jail Authority. (Rosen, Jeff) (Entered: 07/07/2023)

extracted.value: Hampton Roads Regional Jail Authority filed a Motion to Terminate Sections 32-38 of the Agreement on July 7, 2023, seeking to resolve the Department of Justice's investigation of the jail.

evidence.text: 55 | 2023-07-21 | Joint MOTION to Terminate One Substantive Section of The Agreement to Resolve The Department of Justices Investigation of Hampton Roads Regional Jail by Hampton Roads Regional Jail Authority. (Rosen, Jeff) (Entered: 07/21/2023)

extracted.value: Hampton Roads Regional Jail Authority filed a Joint Motion to Terminate One Substantive Section of the Agreement on July 21, 2023, seeking to modify the Consent Decree terms.
